comments:
I20050823-0800

Somehow during synchronize, a project got out of sync with the filesystem,
resulting in two resources visible in eclipse that did not really exist
(<project>/temp.folder and <project>/build.xml). 

- auto refresh is on
- from the synchronize view, where the resources are visible as outgoing
changes, I selected the two and pressed 'Delete'
-> got the exception below

- trying the same from the Pkg Explorer showed a warning dialog telling me that
the resource was out of sync.


!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 2005-08-25 10:39:18.840
